name: Loogie Quest
description:
Ever since Mehro has been the hero, his brother, Loogie, wanted to follow in his footsteps...and has failed to do so. Mehro can defeat any enemy he comes across, but the untalented Loogie is so much of a failure, that he dies instantly when he makes contact with an enemy that is slightly stronger than a Goombl. So, Loogie has went on a quest to defeat every Goombl in the world. Also there's a princess in need of help or something.

TIP: The giant goombls' weakness is his feet.

NOTE: This is a spoof on Luigi from the Mario franchise. I do not own Mario or Luigi. Please don't sue me.
